sentences.en: Among his cohorts were the now - famous artists Degas, Monet and Cezanne.
sentences.cn: 与他趣味相投的朋友包括现在声名卓著的艺术家德迦 、 莫奈和塞尚.

sentences.en: As might be expected in the cataract case, the effect is strongest the Monet's later paintings.
sentences.cn: 可以预料,在白内障的情况下, 效果是最强的,在莫奈的油画稍后.

sentences.en: But this rarely works-after all, a knowledgeable collector isn't going to buy a stolen Monet that he can't display publicly.
sentences.cn: 但这种情况很少，毕竟知识渊博的藏家不会买一副被盗而无法公开展示的莫奈名画。

sentences.en: Claude Monet was a great artist. He was famous for painting.
sentences.cn: 莫内是个伟大的艺术家, 他以绘画著名.

sentences.en: Got a little lamp there . Is that monet?
sentences.cn: 那是莫内(法国印象主义创始人)的作品 吗 ?

sentences.en: Impressionism name from the famous monet was impression?
sentences.cn: 印象主义的名称源于莫奈的名作《日出印象》?

sentences.en: Impressionists such as Monet and Pissarro
sentences.cn: 莫奈和毕沙罗等印象派画家

sentences.en: Monet described his attempts to observe and capture the colors in nature thus: “I’m chasing the merest sliver of color.
sentences.cn: 莫奈如此描述自己观察和捕捉大自然中的色彩的尝试：“我追逐最最细微的色彩。

sentences.en: Monet said: “Color owes its brightness to force of contrast rather than to its inherent qualities … primary colors look brightest when they are brought into contrast with their complementaries.
sentences.cn: 莫奈说过：“色彩的亮度，是源于对比的力度，而非其固有特质……原色在与其补色对比时，看起来最亮。”

sentences.en: Monet specializes in experimental and performance techniques of light and shadows.
sentences.cn: 莫奈擅长光与影的实验与表现技法.

sentences.en: Monet was a French painter who lived between 1840 and 1926.
sentences.cn: 莫奈是一名法国画家,生于1840年,1926年去世.

sentences.en: Monet's landscape painting, always make people's Lenovo a lot of.
sentences.cn: 莫奈的风景画, 总是让人联想颇多.

sentences.en: One of the pieces was painted by Claude Monet in 1897.
sentences.cn: 其中一幅是克劳德·莫奈在1897所创作的作品.

sentences.en: The hottest show in town was the Monet Exhibition at the Art Institute.
sentences.cn: 全城最轰动的展览是在美术学院举办的莫奈画展。

sentences.en: There is a famous painting of sunrise by Monet in this gallery.
sentences.cn: 这个美术馆里有一幅有名的莫奈的日出画.

sentences.en: Vandals seriously damage artwork by the renowned artist Claude Monet.
sentences.cn: 享有盛誉的艺术大师克劳德?莫奈的作品被一些文艺破坏者严重损毁.

sentences.en: When Monet becomes VanGogh, love becomes worship.
sentences.cn: 当莫奈变成凡高时, 爱情变成了崇拜.

sentences.en: When Monet came to the Louvre in Paris, where he saw many painters imitating famous artists.
sentences.cn: 当莫奈来到巴黎卢浮宫, 在那里他看到许多画家在模仿著名艺术家的作品.

trans.tran_cn: [人名] 莫尼特，[地名] [加拿大] 莫内
